title: My mouse is acting strange in game, help!!
body: I recently updated my Mac to the new Sierra platform, and after my mouse started acting strange and glitching out whenever I got into a game.  My mouse works perfectly fine, but only does weird things once I enter into a game.  If you have any thoughts or even solutions it would be appreciated thanks.

replies.body: this is happening with any mouse that I connect to my Mac.

New operating systems are prone to strange interactions until the kinks have been worked out. Since this happens with any mouse, I recommend [rolling back to 10.11 El Capitan](http://www.macworld.co.uk/how-to/mac-software/how-downgrade-from-macos-sierra-el-capitan-remove-macos-sierra-3581872/) to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Does this happen with a specific pointing device (touchpad, certain mouse) or does this happen with any mouse you connect to your Mac?
I am having the same problem with madcatz mouse
